meanings.definition: To make impure or unclean by contact or mixture
meanings.sent1: The dirty water will contaminate the clean stream.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to contaminate the food with bacteria.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally contaminate my white shirt with ink.
meanings.sent4: His negative attitude seemed to contaminate the whole group.
meanings.sent5: The virus can easily contaminate the entire population if not controlled.

meanings.sent1: The oil spill will contaminate the ocean water.
meanings.sent2: Please do not contaminate the environment with litter.
meanings.sent3: The muddy shoes will contaminate the clean floor.
meanings.sent4: Her lies began to contaminate the trust in the relationship.
meanings.sent5: The toxic chemicals can contaminate the air we breathe.
